name: AlphaPoint Technology
overview:
AlphaPoint Technology is the leading provider of IT asset management software and data center management solutions. AssetCentral is a cutting-edge, intuitive, web-based IT asset management software (ITAM) and data center management software (DCIM) solution that empowers IT professionals to simplify data center operations, streamline processes, implement best practices, improve service delivery, mitigate risk, and help drive green data center initiatives.

AssetCentral is designed to get companies quickly started with IT Asset Management and provide an effective foundation for DCIM initiatives. AssetCentral is available in 3 Editions: UltraLite, Lite & Enterprise.

AssetCentral UltraLite is a FREE trial version of AssetCentral. Simply download and install AssetCentral UltraLite and see for yourself how easy IT Asset Management can be. AssetCentral UltraLite comes with a license to track 50 devices.

AssetCentral Lite is a hosted version of our IT Asset Management software. Hosted securely on Rackspace, AssetCentral Lite is a solution focused on billing simplicity, enabling companies of all sizes the ability to effectively track their IT assets and manage multiple data centers. AssetCentral Lite customers can select a monthly or annual subscription option.

AssetCentral Enterprise is a robust on-premise ITAM solution for large enterprises and co-location data centers. AssetCentral Enterprise also includes our Connectivity Module which tracks and manages power & network connectivity. Because, AssetCentral Enterprise is installed on your servers (virtual or physical), it can be integrated with 3rd party monitoring and management tools.

acquisitions.source_description: AlphaPoint Technology, Inc. Acquires SoftPay Solutions On-Line Payment Systems, Through its Subsidiary, AlphaPoint Payment Systems

external_links.title: AlphaPoint Releases New Application for Managing IT Assets
